snippet: SWADOS--Elizabeth "Liz." The Mercer-Houston Dog Run community mourns the loss of our beloved member. This incandescent spirit enhanced us through her deep humanity, integrity, and singular talent. We cherish her memory. Our heartfelt sympathies to her devoted wife, Roz, and gentle pats to Clementine and Leo. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SWADOS--Elizabeth "Liz." The Mercer-Houston Dog Run community mourns the loss of our beloved member. This incandescent spirit enhanced us through her deep humanity, integrity, and singular talent. We cherish her memory. Our heartfelt sympathies to her devoted wife, Roz, and gentle pats to Clementine and Leo. 1/3
